title: BNB price analysis: ‘Double top’ setup warns of 30% drop ahead
contentSnippet: BNB’s price upside momentum is waning further after Binance faces $21.75 billion outflows and margin system exploit accusations.

title: UK Electoral Commission ‘Updating’ Crypto Donation Guidance
contentSnippet: The regulator’s plans to update its guidance come as Reform UK has reportedly received the country’s first crypto donation.

title: After Oct. 10 Crypto Crash, Bitwise CIO’s Three-Question Test Finds No Lasting Damage
contentSnippet: In an Oct. 14 memo, Matt Hougan says about $20 billion was liquidated, no major firms failed, core tech mostly held and clients stayed calm — signs the impact won’t last.

title: Stablecoins Will Disrupt Cross-Border Payments, Investment Bank William Blair Says
contentSnippet: Circle and Coinbase are poised to benefit most, as stablecoins reshape global payments and challenge the dominance of traditional correspondent banks.

title: Blast From the Past: Previous U.S. Government Shutdown Aligned With Bitcoin's Bear Market Bottom
contentSnippet: Today’s shutdown coincides with record gold prices, and a major leverage flush out.

title: IREN and WULF Shares Jump as Companies Launch Billion Dollar Debt Deals
contentSnippet: Both companies unveil major note offerings to strengthen balance sheets and accelerate growth in data center and computing infrastructure

title: No Data, No USD Bears. Headwind for Bitcoin?: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 15, 2025

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Quantum computers could bring lost Bitcoin back to life: Here’s how
contentSnippet: Quantum computing could enable the reverse engineering of private keys from publicly exposed ones, putting the security of Bitcoin holders at risk.

title: China Merchants Bank tokenizes $3.8B fund on BNB Chain in Hong Kong
contentSnippet: CMBI’s tokenization initiative with BNB Chain builds on its previous work with Singapore-based DigiFT, which tokenized its fund on Solana in August.

title: BNB Holds Near $1,190 as China Merchants Bank Tokenizes Fund on BNB Chain
contentSnippet: BNB Chain and Binance launched initiatives to shore up confidence, including a $45 million airdrop and a $400 million "Together Initiative".

title: XRP price shows promise at $2.50: Is 57% rally still possible?
contentSnippet: XRP’s macro outlook remained bullish, with analysts confident that a bullish breakout was possible if key support levels were reclaimed.

title: Gold Isn’t Overpriced on Purchasing-Power Test, BlackRock’s Evy Hambro Says
contentSnippet: Hambro told Bloomberg TV gold “could go a lot higher” as long-term price decks lag spot; miners’ margins are among the strongest he has seen.

title: Bitcoin metric shows ‘euphoria’ as $112.5K BTC price squeezes new buyers
contentSnippet: Bitcoin short-term holders struggled to seal profits in recent days while overall supply ownership flashed a classic bull-market top warning.

title: Coinbase invests in Indian crypto exchange CoinDCX at $2.45B valuation
contentSnippet: Coinbase Ventures invested in Indian exchange CoinDCX at a $2.45 billion valuation as the US crypto company expands into India and the Middle East.

title: From $10 to $10,000: How dollar-cost averaging works in crypto
contentSnippet: Learn how DCA works in crypto: when to use it, key risks, fees, El Salvador’s example and how it compares to lump-sum investing and other strategies.

title: モブキャストHD、ソラナ投資に5億円を投じる計画　暗号資産事業への本格参入
contentSnippet: モブキャストHDは暗号資産事業への本格参入を決定し、ソラナ（SOL）購入に向け5億円を投資する計画を発表。ステーキング収益も視野に入れる。

title: Synthetix Price Is Up 190% in a Month—Here’s Why
contentSnippet: SNX has surged 190% on its upcoming perpetual DEX launch, with experts viewing its recent pullback as a healthy correction.

title: Ripple Expands Custody Network to Africa Following RLUSD Rollout
contentSnippet: Earlier this year, the firm announced a collaboration with Chipper Cash to power crypto-enabled payments and confirmed that its USD-backed stablecoin, RLUSD, would roll out in African markets.

title: Analysis: DATs Keep Buying Bitcoin, Outperforming ETFs Is the Hard Part
contentSnippet: The boom in corporate bitcoin buyers highlights how fast DATs are scaling. But their model is fragile when outperformance depends on premiums, converts, and cheap debt.

title: リップル、南アフリカでカストディ事業強化　金融大手アブサバンクと提携
contentSnippet: リップルは南アフリカのアブサ銀行と提携し、アフリカで初の大手カストディパートナーを獲得。デジタル資産の安全な保管と事業拡大を進めます。

title: Gold Futures Break $4,200 as Crypto Outflows Hit Record Levels
contentSnippet: Gold’s record surge and heavy crypto outflows signal a pivot by investors toward safe-haven assets ahead of the Federal Reserve’s Beige Book.

title: LuBian Wallet Moves Over $1B in BTC After 3 Years of Inactivity: On-Chain Data
contentSnippet: A wallet linked to the hacked LuBian Bitcoin mining pool moved 9,757 BTC, worth $1.1 billion, after three years of inactivity.

title: イーサリアムFusakaアップグレード、テストネットSepoliaで有効化　12月メインネット実装へ
contentSnippet: イーサリアムの次期アップグレード「Fusaka」が10月14日、テストネットSepoliaで稼働開始した。PeerDAS技術により処理負担を大幅軽減し、取引速度を最大12,000件/秒まで向上。12月のメインネット実装に向けて段階的にテスト展開中。年内2度目の大型アップグレードでスケーラビリティをさらに強化へ。

title: コインチェックグループ、機関投資家向け事業を強化
contentSnippet: Coincheck Groupが仏Aploの買収を完了し、国内では事業法人向けクリプト・トレジャリー支援を開始。海外と国内の両面で機関投資家向け事業を拡大する。

title: コインベース、インド大手の仮想通貨取引所CoinDCXへ投資　評価額3700億円相当
contentSnippet: 米暗号資産取引所大手コインベース・グローバルが、インドの暗号資産取引所CoinDCXに追加出資。投資後の企業価値は24.5億ドルと評価される。この出資はCoinDCXが今年7月にハッキング被害に遭った数カ月後。コインベースはインドと中東地域での事業拡大を目指す。

title: US Bitcoin and Ether ETFs rebound as Powell signals rate cuts
contentSnippet: US spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs reversed course with fresh inflows after a wave of outflows following the recent market meltdown.

title: How a crypto trader turned $3K into $2M after CZ mentioned a memecoin
contentSnippet: After BNB Chain’s X hack, meme token “4” surged from $3K to $2M following CZ’s mention. We break down the timeline and key risks.

title: Taiwanese Stablecoin Infrastructure Company OwlTing Secures Nasdaq Listing
contentSnippet: OwlTing’s Nasdaq debut marks a milestone for Asian blockchain firms entering U.S. markets amid rising stablecoin demand.

title: ブラックロックCEO、資産トークン化を次の成長戦略に　620兆円市場狙う
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのラリー・フィンクCEOが、不動産から株式・債券まであらゆる資産のトークン化を次なる成長戦略と位置づけた。世界のデジタルウォレットに保管された約620兆円の資金に着目し、ETFのトークン化を視野に入れている。

title: 'Crypto King' Kidnapper Pleads Guilty as Co-Defendants' Trial Delayed
contentSnippet: The plea highlights how flaunting crypto wealth has made investors growing targets for violent crime in the last three years.

title: ソルメイトが75億円相当ソラナを購入、キャシー・ウッドのアークが主要株主に
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のソルメイト・インフラストラクチャーがソラナ財団から75億円相当のSOLを15%割引で購入。米大手ヘッジファンドアーク・インベストが11.5%の同社株を保有している。

title: バイナンス、仮想通貨の上場費用告発を否定
contentSnippet: バイナンスはリミットレス・ラボのヘザリントンCEOがトークン供給量の8%要求を告発したことに対し、虚偽で名誉毀損的だと反論。取引所は上場手数料を請求していないと表明した。

title: ニューヨーク市、全米初の自治体仮想通貨専門局を設立
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク市のアダムス市長が行政命令に署名し、全米初となる自治体の仮想通貨・ブロックチェーン局を設立した。モイセス・レンドン氏が局長に任命され、責任ある仮想通貨の利用を促進する。

title: Coinbase to Invest in India's CoinDCX, Expand in South Asia and the Middle East
contentSnippet: Coinbase’s investment creates a "regional corridor" connecting India's user base with Middle East capital, Decrypt was told.

title: Corporate Bitcoin Holdings Jump to $117B as Firms Double Down on Crypto Treasuries
contentSnippet: Public companies boosted Bitcoin holdings to record highs last quarter, underscoring rising institutional confidence amid market volatility.

title: バイナンス、韓国への再進出なるか　当局がGopax買収で二年半ぶりに審査再開＝報道
contentSnippet: 韓国当局が仮想通貨取引所バイナンスのGopax買収審査を約二年半ぶりに再開したと伝えられる。米国での訴訟取り下げが背景で、今年中の役員変更承認の可能性もある。

title: Stablecoin Issuers Race for US Bank Charters as Stripe's Bridge Joins the Queue
contentSnippet: Bridge, Stripe’s stablecoin arm, has applied to the OCC for a national trust bank, joining four others vying for federal approval.

title: Does the Bitcoin 'Debasement Trade' Narrative Still Hold Up After the Crash?
contentSnippet: Gold hit a new high on Monday, while Bitcoin remains wounded. Will crypto still be an asset of choice for traders wanting to dodge currency debasement?

title: Japanese Regulator Eyes Ban on Crypto Insider Trading: Nikkei
contentSnippet: Japanese regulators are working to ban insider trading on crypto in the country, according to a report from Nikkei.
